content: tcm390: Merged 4 significant PRs this month, including the integration of Tavily (#518, +297/-4 lines) and a substantial Discord bot voice implementation (#633, +811/-667 lines). Contributed actively to codebase refactoring, notably with PR #722 which improved ClientBase to use a map for managing multiple Twitter instances. Submitted 6 code reviews while maintaining 2 open PRs, demonstrating occasional but impactful activity across 9 days this month with substantial code changes totaling +2089/-1458 lines.
